info.name: HR Automation - OCR API
info.description:
OCR (Optical Character Recognition) API for extracting text from resumes (PDFs and images).

Base URL: http://localhost:3001/api/v1/ocr

Features:
- Extract text from PDFs and images
- Parse resumes into structured data
- Validate file formats
- Health checks

request.description:
Check if the OCR service is operational and ready to process documents.

Returns:
- Service status
- Supported formats
- OCR engine information
- Maximum file size

response.name: Success Response

formdata.description: Upload resume file (PDF, JPEG, PNG, etc.)

request.description:
Upload a resume document (PDF or image) and extract text.

Accepts:
- PDF documents (searchable and scanned)
- Images (JPEG, PNG, GIF, BMP, TIFF)
- Max file size: 10MB

Returns:
- Extracted text (cleaned)
- Raw text (unprocessed)
- File metadata
- Processing time
- Quality validation

response.name: Success Response

request.description:
Upload a resume, extract text using OCR, AND parse it into structured data.

This combines OCR extraction with AI-powered resume parsing in one request.

Returns:
- Extracted text
- Parsed resume data:
  - Name, email, phone
  - Skills array
  - Work experience
  - Education
  - Certifications
  - Total years of experience

response.name: Success Response

request.description:
Check if a file can be processed by the OCR service before uploading.

Validates:
- File format (PDF or supported image)
- File size
- File type detection

Returns:
- Can process (boolean)
- File information
- Detected type
